name: 2 Bee II ! 2 Bee
description:
Use WASD or arrows to move

H to mute the sounds

In this game you control 2 bees simultaneously, your objective is to collect all the honey scattered on the map while paying attention to the insecticide.

The theme of the game jam was "two" so we control two bees with only one controller.

Assets from the internet:

-typeface : https://www.fontspace.com/summerbee-font-f46710

-typeface: https://www.dafont.com/fr/minecrafter.font

-icons: https://www.freepng.fr/
